cause.description:
Myself and many others like me feel the crime rate in south africa is unacceptable. People are being raped, mudered, abused, robbed everyday. we have the highest crime rate in the WORLD. help us raise funds to impove crime prevention in our country.
1. safety is a human right
2. action and policy go hand in hand
3. we have the right to a crime free south africa
cause.name: Crime Prevention
